titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel MANDIRAN.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.4820.

bill.summary: 11/18/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.
